inputs.remark:
Differential diagnosis: Textbook uses “Ossicular Fixation”; “Otosclerosis” should be inferred (not explicitly named).
Spelling: Fix to “Ménière's”.
SRT values: Update to Right 35 dB HL, Left 30 dB HL (from 33/28).

logic_summary: Replaced 'Otosclerosis' with 'Ossicular Fixation' in the differential diagnosis label to align with textbook terminology as requested.
Updated SRT values in Speech Audiometry results to 35 dB HL (Right) and 30 dB HL (Left) to match the text description, correcting the values from the figure (33/28).
The spelling of 'Ménière's' in the JSON was found to be already correct (with accents and apostrophe), so no changes were applied for that remark.

patch_ops.value: SRTs 35 dB HL (Right) and 30 dB HL (Left); WRS excellent (96% Right, 100% Left).
